## OtherPerson.onDetailStream() method

Callback method to retrieve the Stream to receive detailed information. This stream is used to receive hand and head movements, facial expressions, etc see: [Player.onRequestDetailStream()](./verse-core.player.onrequestdetailstream.md)

**Signature:**

```typescript
onDetailStream(data:Uint8Array): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  data | Uint8Array |  |

**Returns:**

void
